</title>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 39 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 2,900 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Base Weapon** [Pepperbox](/Weapons.aspx?ID=205)
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This _+2 [greater striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [pepperbox](/Weapons.aspx?ID=205)_ cycles through several magical cores, swapping in new ones while the previous ones cool. The gun deals fire or electricity damage, alternating with each attack as it rotates cores. Arcadian gunslingers liken the rotating cores to a group of dancers, each taking their turn in the spotlight.

**Activate** <actions string="Two Actions" /> ([manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=645)) **Frequency** once per day;   **Effect** The _spark dancer_ casts either [_fireball_](/Spells.aspx?ID=119) or [_lightning bolt_](/Spells.aspx?ID=172), depending on whether the current core would deal fire or electricity damage, as a 7th-level arcane spell (DC 30).

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
